Summary: Q27 buses are detoured in both directions because of roadwork taking place at 46th Ave/159th St.
Description:
Q27 buses are detoured in both directions because of roadwork taking place at 46th Ave/159th St.
While detoured, northbound Q27 buses will not service stops along 46th Ave from 156th St to 162nd St.

Southbound Q27 buses will not service stops along 46th Ave from 160th St to Parsons Blvd.

Stops will instead be made, as requested, along Franconia Ave and 45th Ave.

Click here to view a map of this detour.

Note: Bus arrival information may be inaccurate or unavailable while buses are detoured.

[accessibility icon] The nearest accessible subway station connecting with the Q70-SBS is 61 St-Woodside [accessibility icon] [7]. 

For additional travel alternatives, plan your trip at mta.info, use the MTA app (download the app for iOS or Android), or check our Elevator & Escalator Status page.

What's happening?
We're replacing the elevators

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus

Summary: Southbound B44 stop on Nostrand Ave at Avenue N is closed; use nearby stops on Nostrand Ave at Avenue M or Kings Highway
Description:
Southbound B44 stop on Nostrand Ave at Avenue N is closed; use nearby stops on Nostrand Ave at Avenue M or Kings Highway
See a map of this stop change.

Summary: Southbound M4 and M5 buses are detoured because of utility work at Broadway/W 145th St until approximately 5:00 AM.
Description:
Southbound M4 and M5 buses are detoured because of utility work at Broadway/W 145th St until approximately 5:00 AM.
While detoured, buses will not make stops from Broadway/W 142nd St to Broadway/W 138th St.
Instead, buses will make stops along Amsterdam Ave, as requested.

Note: Bus arrival information may be inaccurate or unavailable while buses are detoured.

Click here to view a map of the detoured route.

Summary: Northbound M104 stop on Broadway between W 84th St and W 85th St is being bypassed, use nearby stops on Broadway at W 82nd St or W 86th St instead
Description:

See a map of nearby stops.

Description:
